stories.Title: AMD: A potential threat to Nvidia's reign
stories.Description: While Nvidia's GPUs have been the go-to choice for AI training, MosaicML's tests show that AMD chips are a worthy contender, as they can deliver comparable performance to Nvidia's.

stories.Title: AI vs. Public data
stories.Description: Google has recently updated its privacy policy, and it's stirring up a conversation about using publicly available data to train AI models.

stories.Title: Harvard’s new teacher
stories.Description: Meet the CS50 Bot. This AI tool, powered by ChatGPT, offers personalized assistance to computer science students, enhancing their learning experience.

stories.Title: Luxury meets clean energy
stories.Description: Rolls Royce has just entered the world of electric vehicles with the 2024 Spectre EV. This electric coupe showcases the finest in craftsmanship and design in conjunction with powerful performance.

stories.Title: Tesla has a summer job for you
stories.Description: The company plans to hire a fleet of Seasonal Vehicle Operators across North America this summer. These operators will assist in capturing high-quality data to enhance vehicle performance.

stories.Title: Vision Pro faces new setbacks
stories.Description: Apple is currently facing production challenges with the Vision Pro headset. The complexity of design and manufacturing difficulties have impacted availability and launch plans.

stories.Title: Ingenuity phones home!
stories.Description: Lost in the Martian hills, NASA's Ingenuity faced the challenge of losing communication with its rover companion Perseverance. After 63 long days, it's back in touch with mission control.

stories.Title: Onward to the Moon
stories.Description: At NASA's Marshall Space Flight Center, a dedicated team is working tirelessly into crafting the flight software for the rocket that will carry the Artemis crew on their lunar journey.

stories.Title: VSParticle: Breaking barriers in nanotech
stories.Description: This Dutch startup is revolutionizing material innovation for a sustainable future. With €14.5 million in funding, their nanoparticle technology opens up endless possibilities for saving our planet.

stories.Title: Bye bye Lightning port
stories.Description: Apple is making a bold move with the iPhone 15. The iconic Lightning port will be replaced with USB-C, bringing compatibility and connectivity across Apple devices.

stories.Title: Instagram unveils Threads
stories.Description: As Twitter faces rate-limit errors, Instagram's Threads enters the scene, offering a new space for community discussions and connections.

title: Vision Pro faces a major setback, iPhone moves from Lightning to USB-C, AMD comes for Nvidia's throne
